teos¶

Python front-end for C++ teos controll classes, which implement functionality needed for EOSIO smart-contract development process, yet not available form the EOSIO cleos.

class teos.ABI(source, code_name='', include_dir='', is_verbose=1)¶

Bases: teos._Teos
